course.name: 30-Day AI Catch-Up Program (EN)
course.description: 30-day practical AI program for beginners and late adopters: short, focused lessons with concrete examples, guided and independent exercises, and QA habits to make AI useful and safe in everyday work.

lessons.title: What AI is (and what it is not)
The 4 parts of a good prompt
